description:
When I have Juno control and Icehouse compute and icehouse network deleting an instance doesn't work. 

This is due to the Fixed IP object having an embedded version of the network object that is too new for Icehouse. This causes and infinite loop
title: Can't delete when control Juno and compute icehouse

comments.content:
When I have Juno control and Icehouse compute and icehouse network deleting an instance doesn't work. 

This is due to the Fixed IP object having an embedded version of the network object that is too new for Icehouse. This causes and infinite loop
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sorrison

comments.content: Can you add the stacktrace from the logs and which specific versions you are using.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content:
Control infrastructure is all running stable/juno

A compute node is running nova-compute and nova-network running stable/juno

Attempt to delete an instance results in this stack in nova-network:

2015-01-13 08:31:50.907 18507 TRACE oslo.messaging.rpc.dispatcher     self.channel_id, allowed_methods)
2015-01-13 08:31:50.907 18507 TRACE oslo.messaging.rpc.dispatcher   File "/opt/icehouse/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/amqp/connection.py", line 240, in _wait_method
2015-01-13 08:31:50.907 18507 TRACE oslo.messaging.rpc.dispatcher     self.method_reader.read_method()
2015-01-13 08:31:50.907 18507 TRACE oslo.messaging.rpc.dispatcher   File "/opt/icehouse/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/amqp/method_framing.py", line 189, in read_method
2015-01-13 08:31:50.907 18507 TRACE oslo.messaging.rpc.dispatcher     raise m
2015-01-13 08:31:50.907 18507 TRACE oslo.messaging.rpc.dispatcher RuntimeError: maximum recursion depth exceeded


This is because Juno nova-conductor sends back a FixedIP object of version 1.1 with an embedded Network object of 1.2, icehouse then incorrectly tries to backport the FixedIP object again (as opposed to the Network object) leading to a loop.

Juno:
FixedIP object: 1.4
Network object: 1.2

Icehouse
FixedIP object: 1.1
Network object: 1.1
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sorrison
